es.ucm.fdi.gaia.recolibry.api

Interface Query

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MahoutCFItemQuery, MahoutCFUserQuery, QueryJColibri

    public interface Query
    Interface to define methods necessary in a Query object.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jose L. Jorro-Aragoneses

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getAttributesNames()
      Method to obtain the name of all attributes contained in the bean object.

      Method to get the value asigned in an bean's attribute.

      Method to build an empty bean object.

      • setAttributeValue

        void setAttributeValue(String attributeName,
                       Object value)
        Method to add a value to an attribute of the query bean.
        Parameters:

      • getAttributeValue

        Object getAttributeValue(String attribute)
        Method to get the value asigned in an bean's attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - name of the attribute to get the value.
        Returns:
        value that contains the attribute.
